message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $18,000 is above my budget. I'm interested in the product but can only offer $8,000 at this time.

Bob, I understand your initial offer, but $18,000 is significantly lower than my asking price.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. I believe this price point represents a fair deal considering the value this product offers.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To meet you halfway, I'm willing to accept $12,500.  This is my final offer, as it represents the absolute lowest price I can accept for this product.
